String.name: InfoText
String.value: Welcome to {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME} Support Wizard! {nl}Please enter your contact details, provide feedback or describe the software problem occurred in the form below. The {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME} Support Team will immediately receive your message and process it. {nl}Please mind that logs report will be sent together with the message automatically.

String.name: InfoUninstallText
String.value: It seems you're about to uninstall {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME}. Would you please let us know why? {nl}Please provide your contact details below and let us know the purpose of uninstalling {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME} from your Mac

String.name: InfoExceptionText
String.value: Oops... An unexpected error occurred while using {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME}. {nl}Please provide your contact details below and kindly let us know 5 last steps you made by means of {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME} before it has crashed. Also would appreciate you attaching a screenshot of any error messages that appeared when using the application and prior to the crash.

String.name: MoreReport
String.value: Would you like to send one more message?

String.name: AttachInfo
String.value: Attach files (up to 5 items or 20 MB)

String.name: AttachmentOverflow
String.value: You are trying to attach more than 5 files or the total size of files exceeds 20Mb. Please attach less files

String.name: AttachmentButtonToolTip
String.value: Remove this item from the list

String.name: HeaderTitle
String.value: After you click “Uninstall {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME}”, you can be asked for password to delete all processes related to {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME}

String.name: UninstallReason
String.value: What is the reason for uninstalling?

String.name: NotDisclosedPrice
String.value: Price was not disclosed before installation

String.name: DescriptionWithArrow
String.value: Please help us make {MAIN_PRODUCT_NAME} better and specify the reason for uninstalling it

String.name: SMTPServerError
String.value: Connection to the SMTP server failed

String.name: UncorrectInformation
String.value: Message not sent. Please check if the details you have provided are correct and try again

String.name: EmptyLetter
String.value: You wrote nothing in the body of the message

String.name: UnexpectedError
String.value: An unexpected error occured. Please try again later.
